content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tblparentdatastream (
	[SOURCE] nvarchar(4000),
	[xMediaGroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[MEDIATYPE] nvarchar(4000),
	[xMediaChannel] nvarchar(4000),
	[AgencyChannelName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Account] nvarchar(4000),
	[LOB] nvarchar(4000),
	[BU] nvarchar(4000),
	[PARENTCAMPAIGNNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[SUBCAMPAIGNNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[COUNTRYCODE] nvarchar(4000),
	[COUNTRYNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[REGION] nvarchar(4000),
	[xCampaignQuarter] nvarchar(4000),
	[SearchKeywordType] nvarchar(4000),
	[SearchMatchType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmeaRegion] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmeaSubRegion] nvarchar(4000),
	[xAccountCurrency] nvarchar(4000),
	[Compliant] nvarchar(4000),
	[AgencyOwnerMarket] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignScale] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignObjective] nvarchar(4000),
	[MediaBriefName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Impression] nvarchar(4000),
	[Click] nvarchar(4000),
	[View] nvarchar(4000),
	[Swiperate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Year] nvarchar(4000),
	[Quarter] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'parentdatastream/part-00000-tid-2886452130161708956-505b6f93-044e-4c7f-827f-9afed77f318c-4-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tblparentdatastream
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tbldigitalmarketing (
	[SOURCE] nvarchar(4000),
	[xMediaGroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[MEDIATYPE] nvarchar(4000),
	[xMediaChannel] nvarchar(4000),
	[AgencyChannelName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Account] nvarchar(4000),
	[LOB] nvarchar(4000),
	[BU] nvarchar(4000),
	[PARENTCAMPAIGNNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[SUBCAMPAIGNNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[COUNTRYCODE] nvarchar(4000),
	[COUNTRYNAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[REGION] nvarchar(4000),
	[xCampaignQuarter] nvarchar(4000),
	[SearchKeywordType] nvarchar(4000),
	[SearchMatchType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmeaRegion] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmeaSubRegion] nvarchar(4000),
	[xAccountCurrency] nvarchar(4000),
	[Compliant] nvarchar(4000),
	[AgencyOwnerMarket] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignScale] nvarchar(4000),
	[CampaignObjective] nvarchar(4000),
	[MediaBriefName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Impression] nvarchar(4000),
	[Click] nvarchar(4000),
	[View] nvarchar(4000),
	[Swiperate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Year] nvarchar(4000),
	[Quarter] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'parentdatastream/part-00000-tid-2886452130161708956-505b6f93-044e-4c7f-827f-9afed77f318c-4-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tbldigitalmarketing
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.digitalmarketing
	AS SELECT * FROM dbo.tbldigitalmarketing

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tapplications (
	[ApplicationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[CandidateId] nvarchar(4000),
	[Job] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobDepartment] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobLocation] nvarchar(4000),
	[Stage] nvarchar(4000),
	[AppliedOrSourcedDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Disqualified] nvarchar(4000),
	[DisqualifiedAt] nvarchar(4000),
	[DisqualifiedReason] nvarchar(4000),
	[Source] nvarchar(4000),
	[SourceSubType] nvarchar(4000),
	[ResumeUrl] nvarchar(4000),
	[Year] int,
	[Week] int,
	[TrackerType] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'capstone/output/tblapplications/part-00000-6e05a74f-13d0-4f3e-a9ff-30ceccd4bb1e-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tapplications
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tblapplications (
	[Job] nvarchar(4000),
	[ApplicationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[CandidateId] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobDepartment] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobLocation] nvarchar(4000),
	[Stage] nvarchar(4000),
	[AppliedOrSourcedDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Disqualified] nvarchar(4000),
	[DisqualifiedAt] nvarchar(4000),
	[DisqualifiedReason] nvarchar(4000),
	[Source] nvarchar(4000),
	[SourceSubType] nvarchar(4000),
	[ResumeUrl] nvarchar(4000),
	[Year] int,
	[Week] int,
	[CohortName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TrackerType] nvarchar(4000),
	[Reach] nvarchar(4000),
	[Test] nvarchar(4000),
	[Interview] nvarchar(4000),
	[Offer] nvarchar(4000),
	[Conversion] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'capstone/output/tblapplications/part-00000-b6e425df-1e36-487f-af95-9c38db953d3c-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [dlsg2markfilesystem_synapsedlakestgen2mark_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tblapplications
GO

properties.description: create view applications in talentlyft database

content.query:
Drop VIEW dbo.testapplications

CREATE VIEW dbo.applications
	AS SELECT * FROM dbo.tapplications

source:
%%pyspark
#Load to Dataframe
df_app = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Application.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_candidate = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Candidate.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_department = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Department.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_job = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Job.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_joblist = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/JobList.csv', format='csv', header=True)
df_stage = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Stage.csv', format='csv', header=True)

#Change 'undefined' to empty space
df_app = df_app.fillna(value = "")
df_candidate = df_candidate.fillna(value = "")
df_department = df_department.fillna(value = "")
df_job = df_job.fillna(value = "")
df_joblist = df_joblist.fillna(value = "")
df_stage = df_stage.fillna(value = "")

#display(df_app.limit(5))
#display(df_candidate.limit(5))
#display(df_department.limit(5))
#display(df_job.limit(5))
#display(df_joblist.limit(5))
#display(df_stage.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#Applications + Stage

df_appStage = df_app.join(df_stage, [df_stage['Id'] == df_app ['stageId'], df_stage['applicationId'] == df_app ['id']], 'left') \
    .select(df_app['Id'], df_app['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', col('created').alias('appCreated'), col('disqualified').alias('appDisqualified')
        , col('disqualifiedAt').alias('appDisqualifiedAt'), col('disqualificationReason').alias('appDisqualificationReason')
        , col('name').alias('stage'), 'type', 'jobId', 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appStage.limit(5))
#display(df_joblist.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStage + Job

df_appstJob = df_appStage.join(df_joblist, [df_joblist['Id'] == df_appStage['jobId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason', 'stage', 'type'
        , col('title').alias('job'), df_joblist['departmentId'], df_joblist['locationCountry'], df_joblist['locationCountryCode'], df_joblist['region'], df_joblist['city'], df_joblist['zipCode'], df_joblist['status']
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appstJob.limit(5))

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import functions as f

#Create tagging for each Stage
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("conversion", 
    f.when((f.col("Stage") == "Sourced") | (f.col("Stage") == "Applied"), "Reach")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Screen") | (f.col("Stage") == "OfferToClient"), "Test")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Interview"), "Interview")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Shortlisted") | (f.col("Stage") == "Offer"), "Offer")
    .when((f.col("Stage") == "Hired"), "Conversion")
    .otherwise("NA"))

#Tag as 1 if Conversion to get which stage are converted
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isReach", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Reach"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isTest", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Test"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isInterview", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Interview"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isOffer", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Offer"), 1).otherwise(0))
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("isConversion", f.when((f.col("conversion") == "Conversion"), 1).otherwise(0))

#Create new column with removed special characters
df_appstJob = df_appstJob.withColumn("JobDescNoChar", f.lower(f.translate(f.col("Job"),"./!-() ","")))

#display(df_appstJob.limit(5))
#display(df_department.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJob + Department

df_appstjobDept = df_appstJob.join(df_department, [df_department['Id'] == df_appstJob['departmentId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason'
        , 'stage', 'conversion', 'isReach', 'isTest', 'isInterview', 'isOffer', 'isConversion', 'type'
        , 'job', col('name').alias('department')
        , 'locationCountry', 'locationCountryCode', 'region', 'city', 'zipCode', 'status'
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')

#display(df_appstjobDept.limit(5))
#display(df_candidate.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJobDepartment + Candidate

df_appCandidate = df_appstjobDept.join(df_candidate, [df_candidate['Id'] == df_appstjobDept['candidateId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId']
        , df_candidate['firstName'], df_candidate['lastName'], col('created').alias('candidateCreated'), col('lastModified').alias('candidateLastModified')
        , 'profileUrl', 'appCreated', 'appDisqualified', 'appDisqualifiedAt', 'appDisqualificationReason'
        , 'stage', 'conversion', 'isReach', 'isTest', 'isInterview', 'isOffer', 'isConversion', 'type'
        , 'job', 'department'
        , 'locationCountry', 'locationCountryCode', 'region', 'city', 'zipCode', 'status'
        , 'sourceType', 'sourceBy', 'sourceFrom', 'sourceChanel', 'sourceFormatted')


#Create FullName column
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.withColumn('fullName', f.concat(f.col('firstName'),f.lit(' '),f.col('lastName')))

#Remove undefined
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.fillna(value = "")

#display(df_appCandidate.limit(5))

##Drop  table in the default database
##%%sql
##DROP TABLE applications

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("Select MedallionID, HackneyLicenseID, Count(*) as Trips from nyctaxi.trip Where DateID Between '20131217' AND '201312231' Group By MedallionID, HackneyLicenseID Having Count (*) > 100")
display(df)

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""
Select MedallionID, 
Count(MedallionID) as CabTrip 
From nyctaxi.trip 
Where DateID Between '20131217' AND '20131231'
Group By MedallionID 
Order by CabTrip Desc 
""")
display(df)

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""
    Select HackneyLicenseID,
    Count(HackneyLicenseID) as DriverTrip
From nyctaxi.trip
Where DateID Between '20131217' AND '20131231'
Group by HackneyLicenseID
Order by DriverTrip Desc
""")
display(df)

%%pyspark
dg = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
dg = dg.drop('Title')
## Ifheaderexistsuncommentlinebelow
##, header=True
##)
##display(dg.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = df.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_utc_timestamp(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y"),'+08:00')))

display(df.limit(5))
display(df.filter(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate == "01/01/2022").limit(5))

#select two columns in TalentList
dj = dj.select("Id", "Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title", "AcctMngr")
#join tables CohortTableList and TalentList
dq = dg.join(dj, dg.AcctMngrId==dj.Id,"left").drop(dj.Id)
display(dq)

#select two columns in TalentList
dj = dj.select("Id", "Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title", "AcctMngr")
#join tables CohortTableList and TalentList
dq = dg.join(dj, dg.AcctMngrId==dj.Id,"left").drop(dj.Id)
#select two columns in CohortForm
dh = dh.select("Id", "Title")
dh = dh.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
#join tables CohortTableList and CohortForm
da = dq.join(dh, dq.CohortNameId==dh.Id,"left")
da = da.distinct()
#join tables Applications and CohortTableList
ds = df.join(da,df.Job==da.Job,"left")
##ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
display(ds.limit(5))

dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.SourceSubType==dj.TA,"left")

ds = ds.withColumn("FinalTA", when(ds.SourceSubType == ds.TA,ds.SourceSubType).otherwise(ds.AcctMngr))

dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title","PictureURL")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.FinalTA==dj.TA,"left").drop(ds.TA)
ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("PictureURL","FinalTAPicUrl")
ds = ds.drop("ContentTypeID", "ContentType","Modified","Created", "CreatedById", "ModifiedById", \
"Owshiddenversion", "Version", "Path", "ComplianceAssetId")
#ds = ds.withColumn("FinalTAPicUrl", when(ds.SourceSubType == ds.TA,ds.SourceSubType).otherwise(ds.AcctMngr))

##outer join applications table and Cohort Form for Job column
ds=df.join(dg,on="Job",how="outer")
display(ds.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

ds = ds.withColumn("TrackerType", when((ds.Stage == "Sourced") | (ds.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((ds.Stage == "Screen") | (ds.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (ds.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))

display(ds.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

ds = ds.withColumn("Reach", when((ds.TrackerType == "Reach") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Test", when((ds.TrackerType == "Test") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Interview", when((ds.TrackerType == "Interview") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Offer", when((ds.TrackerType == "Offer") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Conversion", when((ds.TrackerType == "Conversion") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \

display(ds.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

ds = ds.withColumn("Reach", when((ds.TrackerType == "Reach") & (ds.Disqualified == "No") , "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Test", when((ds.TrackerType == "Test") & (ds.Disqualified == "No") , "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Interview", when((ds.TrackerType == "Interview") & (ds.Disqualified == "No") , "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Offer", when((ds.TrackerType == "Offer") & (ds.Disqualified == "No") , "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Conversion", when((ds.TrackerType == "Conversion") & (ds.Disqualified == "No") , "1").otherwise("0")) \

display(ds.limit(5))

ds = ds.drop("id","job" )
ds = ds.distinct()

ds = ds.repartition(1)
ds.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.applications")

##Drop  table in the default database
##%%sql
##DROP TABLE applications

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = df.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y")))

display(df.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = df.withColumn("TrackerType", when((df.Stage == "Sourced") | (df.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((df.Stage == "Screen") | (df.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((df.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") 
.when((df.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (df.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((df.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))

display(df.limit(5))

##Drop  table in the default database
##%%sql
##DROP TABLE applications
spark.sql("DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS default CASCADE")

%%pyspark
#loading applications.csv to dataframe
df = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/applications.csv', format='csv'
## Ifheaderexistsuncommentlinebelow
, header=True
)

%%pyspark
#loading CohortTableList.parquet to dataframe
dg = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
dg = dg.drop('Title')

#loading CohortForm.parquet to dataframe
dh = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortForm.parquet', format='parquet')

#loading Talentlist.parquet to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# removing delimiters, change the case to lower, and directly apply to column Job in dataframe 
df = df.withColumn("Job",lower(translate(col("Job"),"./!-() ","")))

# removing delimiters, change the case to lower, rename JobDescription to Job, and directly apply now 
dg = dg.withColumn("JobDesc",lower(translate(col("JobDescription"),"./!-() ","")) )

# extract Year and Week in AppliedOrSourcedDate from applications dataframe
df = df.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_date(df.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y")))

#<-- join tables to create a flat file applications dataframe-->

#select two columns in TalentList
dj = dj.select("Id", "Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title", "AcctMngr")
#join tables CohortTableList and TalentList
dq = dg.join(dj, dg.AcctMngrId==dj.Id,"left").drop(dj.Id)
#select two columns in CohortForm
dh = dh.select("Id", "Title")
dh = dh.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
#join tables CohortTableList and CohortForm
da = dq.join(dh, dq.CohortNameId==dh.Id,"left")
da = da.distinct()
#join tables Applications and CohortTableList
ds = df.join(da,df.Job==da.JobDesc,"left")
##ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("Title","CohortName")
##display(ds.limit(5))

# re-initiate TalentList to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")

#join tables Applications and TalentList
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.SourceSubType==dj.TA,"left")

#choose between fields to impose if sourcesubtype is equal to TA field in TalentList
ds = ds.withColumn("FinalTA", when(ds.SourceSubType == ds.TA,ds.SourceSubType).otherwise(ds.AcctMngr))


#re-intitiate an instance of TalentList to dataframe
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj = dj.select("Title","PictureURL")
dj = dj.withColumnRenamed("Title","TA")

#join Applications and TalentList dataframes
ds = ds.join(dj,ds.FinalTA==dj.TA,"left").drop(ds.TA)
ds = ds.withColumnRenamed("PictureURL","FinalTAPicUrl")
#<-----
#drop unwanted fields that occured during the join
ds = ds.drop("ContentTypeID", "ContentType","Modified","Created", "CreatedById", "ModifiedById", \
"Owshiddenversion", "Version", "Path", "ComplianceAssetId")
#<-- end of join tables to create a flat file applications dataframe-->

#define HTD terms from Stage column in Applications dataframe
ds = ds.withColumn("TrackerType", when((ds.Stage == "Sourced") | (ds.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((ds.Stage == "Screen") | (ds.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (ds.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((ds.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))

#create HTD (Reach, Test, Interview, Offer, Conversion) columns and assign values 1 on parameters TrackerType 
# and CohortName
ds = ds.withColumn("Reach", when((ds.TrackerType == "Reach") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Test", when((ds.TrackerType == "Test") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Interview", when((ds.TrackerType == "Interview") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Offer", when((ds.TrackerType == "Offer") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \
.withColumn("Conversion", when((ds.TrackerType == "Conversion") & (ds.CohortName.isNotNull()), "1").otherwise("0")) \

#drop columns
ds = ds.drop("id", "JobDesc" )
ds = ds.distinct()

#save Applications flat file dataframe as a table in capstone lake database
ds = ds.repartition(1)
ds.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.applications")

#re-initiate CohortTableList dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dg = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortTableList.parquet', format='parquet')
dg.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.CohortTableList")

#re-initiate CohortForm dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dh = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/CohortForm.parquet', format='parquet')
dh.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.CohortForm")

#re-initiate TalentList dataframe and save as a table in capstone lake database
dj = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/output/TalentList.parquet', format='parquet')
dj.write.mode("overwrite") \
.saveAsTable("capstone.TalentList")

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = df.withColumn("Job",lower(translate(col("Job"),"./!-() ","")))
ctl_tbl = ctl_tbl.withColumn("JobDescription",lower(translate(col("JobDescription"),"./!-() ","")))
display(df.limit(5))
display(ctl_tbl.limit(5))

from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *

cfrm_tbl = cfrm_tbl.select("Id","Title")
ctl_tbl = ctl_tbl.select("CohortNameId","JobDescription","AcctMngrId")
join_cfctl=ctl_tbl.join(cfrm_tbl,ctl_tbl.CohortNameId == cfrm_tbl.Id,"left").drop_duplicates()

join_cfctl=join_cfctl.select("AcctMngrId", "JobDescription","CohortNameId","Id","Title")
join_dfctl=df.join(join_cfctl,df.Job == join_cfctl.JobDescription,"left").drop_duplicates()

display(join_dfctl.limit(5))
display(join_cfctl.limit(5))
join_dfctl.count()

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

join_dfctl= join_dfctl.withColumn("Year", year(to_date(join_dfctl.AppliedOrSourcedDate,"M/d/y"))) \
       .withColumn("Week", weekofyear(to_date(join_dfctl.AppliedOrSourcedDate, "M/d/y"))) \
.withColumn("TrackerType", when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Sourced") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Applied") , "Reach")
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Screen") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Assessment"), "Test") 
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Interview"), "Interview") \
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Shortlisted") | (join_dfctl.Stage == "Offer"), "Offer") 
.when((join_dfctl.Stage == "Hired"), "Conversion") 
.otherwise(""))
display(join_dfctl.limit(5))
join_dfctl.count()
